domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text:
@BorisJohnson It will be interesting to see the COVID-19 stats in 1/2 weeks. With focus on how many of them joined the protests, and how many are BAME.

They've potentially undone the success that was made by the country, and unironically, put themselves and their loves ones at risk.
